name: df-mdeg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmdg, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmpl, cv(s1))), csup(crn(cmpt(s3, co(cv(s2), csupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s1))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cv(s3)))), cxr, clt))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ mDeg =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(s2 âˆˆ(Base `(s0[mPoly]s1))â†¦ sup(ran((s3 âˆˆ(s2[supp](0 ` s1))â†¦(CCfld[gsum]s3))), â„*, <)))
comment: Define the degree of a polynomial. Note (SO): as an experiment I am using a definition which makes the degree of the zero polynomial ` -oo ` , contrary to the convention used in ~ df-dgr . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jun-2019.)
